text: Reddit has given me the opportunity to make new friends in real life  and I couldn t be more grateful  I don t know if this is the right place to post  but I really want to tell someone   I like to stream on r RedditSessions occasionally  One night  about two months ago  I was streaming at midnight  I was bored  and I got around  K viewers   After I finished the stream  I got a DM from someone How the fuck do yuo have   followrrrs Spelled exactly like that  I had mentioned during the stream that I had a lot of followers on Reddit   I responded  I quickly realized that he was your average Redditor  a   yr old boy   We talked for a while  then discovered that we live in the same state  Turns out we live about   minutes from each other He wanted to talk some more  so we switched over to Instagram for a bit  so that I could see his face and make sure that he s not a   yr old man   To save time for anyone reading this  long story short we ended up FaceTiming every night for almost   weeks  He introduced me to a few of his friends  who I now consider my friends  He convinced me to buy Minecraft  I only bedrock up until then  and added me to a realm with his friends  along with a discord server with all of them   I played daily  and still do  talking with people on the server as we play   Today is his birthday  so yesterday I went to his his house for a party and finally met him and   of his friends in real life   It was awesome  and I m so grateful that I got to make new friends from Reddit  Not to mention some one the nicest and funniest people I ve ever met   Ben  if you happen to see this  happy birthday And for anyone else reading this  I apologize for the length of this
summary: Reddit has given me the opportunity to make new friends in real life. He convinced me to buy Minecraft. He added me to a realm with his friends and a discord server. Yesterday he went to Ben's birthday party and met him and his friends.

text: A Waste Of TimeIt s sad when you can count the reasons you re still alive on one hand   For me  there are only two reasons why I haven t been able to attempt suicide  One is kind of irrelevant  but there nonetheless   I live in the south and was raised a Christian  It s seen as a sin to kill your self  and while I m not the most religious person  being raised that way my entire life has just instilled this fear of  what if  so I ve been waiting for something to happen that kills me and won t be suicide   The second is that I m   years old  I feel like  with everything I ve been through  suicide would be a massive waste of time  I should have done it when I was first having thoughts at   because it wouldn t have been as large of a waste of time and effort   Now I m in my second year of college in the most conservative state in the US as a gay teen  Life hasn t improved like I ve been hoping for  I haven t found that  special someone  to have a shoulder to cry on  I haven t excelled in my major and been successful in some job  and everything is just as difficult as ever   I m petty and I have no reason to kill myself  I understand that  That doesn t mean I can t still feel like a disappointment and wish for the end to come
summary: Suicide is a waste of time and effort for him. He lives in the south and was raised as a Christian. He's in his second year of college in the most conservative state in the US as a gay teen. Life hasn't improved and he hasn't found the special someone to comfort him.
cleaned: suicide waste time effort live south raise christian second year college conservative state gay teen life not improve not find special comfort

text: Tried to get help for my suicidal friend and now she hates me and is threatening to never talk to me again Basically the title Yesterday my friend  ex girlfriend  met up and she told me about how she had been feeling suicidal We are both in Highschool  and she s been going through a hard time recently  She s depressed  has to deal with gender dysphoria  mtf  and is frustrated at how slow her transition is going  how people don t take her seriously  and all of that She s expressed that she s felt like that before  but I felt this time was more serious because she said she had started writing a note  I tried to comfort her and tell her that I m here for her but she just laughed at me  She feels like she is not emotionally strong enough to deal with the future She is already going to therapy  but won t talk to her therapist about her depression problems because she doesn t want her transition to be slowed down even more So I decided to tell the school counsellor  And they called her parents and told some of the year group coordinators  I think it was the right thing to do because she would not seek help herself  They re going to try and work with her to help her But I m not sure if I made the right choice  I told her that I contacted the counsellor so that she could get help and then she got angry at me  She said that I just made life even harder for her  I betrayed her trust  and that she s not going to speak to me again  But I couldn t just sit with the knowledge that she might kill herself without me doing anything  I don t know what to do  I really value my relationship with her and I fear that I ve lost her  And if she doesn t accept the help then she might still kill herself  I m very worried I guess this was just to vent  thank you for reading  If anyone has any advice then I would appreciate it  I have no idea if I made the right choice but I feel terrible right now
summary: Yesterday my friend's ex girlfriend met up with her suicidal friend. She's depressed and suicidal because of gender dysphoria. I tried to get help for her but she's angry at me and she's threatening to never talk to me again. I contacted the school counsellor and they called her parents and the year group coordinators. They're going to try and help her.

text: I feel like I am going to do something really bad in near futureJust a bit of background info  I ve probably seen about   different people  ranging from counselor to psych registrar at the hospital  and they all sort of look blankly at me and just say things like  in time things will get better  etc   one time I was sectioned and I laid it on a plate to them about exactly how bad I felt and they just sent me home and said  try this app called headspace I haven t seen anyone recently  mental health services discharged me and told me that they couldn t help me  and I haven t been on medication for about six months  I ve taken a wide range of anti depressants to no effect  and things have become even worse   Lately I have had strong feelings of hurting others  These are new as for years I have felt suicidal though homicidal  All these thoughts of hurting myself and others continually rampage around my brain and nothing slows them down or makes them go away  I feel like very soon I am going to cause serious damage to myself  someone else or something else   I ve also developed this concept that everyone I have ever met is in a conspiracy against me to hurt me  use me and mistreat me  I imagine all these people sitting round a huge circular table discussing me and laughing at me  I used to think about this in a joking sort of way though now I genuinely believe it s true  I call it the  I hate  insert my name here  league Therefore if you combine those points of feeling like I am going to do something rather bad  that everyone I have met is in a conspiracy against me and that in the past people time after time after time have shown no interest in taking my issues seriously  gt gt gt gt  it s all too much to handle and I have no bloody idea what to do  I m scared

text: depressed about not being able to commit suicideMy suicidal thoughts are getting stronger and stronger and I don t know why  Every day I wish I could just stop existing  Even when I m in a good mood  there s always a part of me that just wants to disappear  I m just so ready to stop living but I know I can t kill myself because of my family  It would devastate my mom and sister  And knowing that I ll never be able to make myself disappear unless they both somehow died is tearing me up and making me even more depressed which makes the suicidal thoughts even stronger  I don t know how to deal with it  I almost drove myself to a psych hospital today because I felt so overwhelmed with thoughts of killing myself but knew I couldn t do it and it was starting to drive me crazy  I have since somehow calmed down but still can t stop thinking about dying  I just wish I could die in an accident or from an illness or something so that it wouldn t be my fault  I just feel like I m a burden whether I live or kill myself just had to rant
summary: Suicidal thoughts are getting stronger and stronger. Almost drove herself to a psych hospital today because she was overwhelmed with thoughts of killing herself. She can't kill herself because of her family. She wishes she could die in an accident or from an illness.

text: Depressed  recently relapsed into self harm  getting slapped around by life every day It just feels like life decided I was never going to make it years ago  and sometimes I don t know why I shouldn t just give up  Every tiny thing I try to do goes wrong so often it feels like a joke sometimes  This past week  I got held back from graduation a year by a fucking clerical error  I missed a doctors appointment  to get antidepressants  I made months ago due to an auto accident  I broke my glasses that I need to drive  and I started self harming again My struggle with mental illness and with myself keeps me spread thin already  and life constantly kicking me down like this makes living feel like an insurmountable task  I have a support system  and I love them all dearly  but its just so hard to justify trying sometimes  Part of me just feels like I should check myself into inpatient care  part of me wants to fight through it  but most of me just wants to lay in bed and do absolutely nothing I havent had any of my psychiatric medication for almost two months now due to stupid bullshit on my part and doctors being difficult  and every attempt to get back on them just keeps fucking up
summary: Depressed recently relapsed into self harm. Held back from graduation a year by a clerical error, missed a doctors appointment to get antidepressants, broke his glasses and started self harming again. Hasn't had any psychiatric medication for almost two months due to stupid bullshit and doctors being difficult.

text: When will society learn Life isn t all gumdrops and rainbows  Not everyone in life is happy  I for one  am certaintly not I failed at school  and am unqualified and jobless  My fucking parents decided instead of accepting that their son is not acdemically gifted  pushed and  pushed me to keep working like a donkey  I hated it  People are always saying  oh dont kill yourself  life gets so much better but yet here I am fucking hating myself and my existence  I dont know how or when I will do it  but I will  Sometimes people want to die  and that is ok  I will most likely jump
summary: Not everyone is happy in life. I failed at school and am unqualified and jobless. My parents pushed me to keep working even though I hated it. I will kill myself if I can't cope with the stress of living.
